import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Graph_slider from'./graph_slider'; import Argentina from'./countries_graph/argentina'; import Colombia from'./countries_graph/colombia'; import India from'./countries_graph/India'; import Kenya from'./countries_graph/Kenya'; import South_Africa from'./countries_graph/South_Africa'; import Vietnam from'./countries_graph/Vietnam'; import footer from'./footers'; import{ BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link }from 'react-router-dom'; import Slider from "react-slick"; let div; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {div: }; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange = event => { if(event.target.value == "Argentina") { this.setState({ div: }); } else if(event.target.value == "Colombia") { this.setState({ div: }); } else if(event.target.value == "India") { this.setState({ div: }); } else if(event.target.value == "Kenya") { this.setState({ div: }); } else if(event.target.value == "South Africa") { this.setState({ div: }); } else { this.setState({ div: }); } }; render(){ const settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 5000 }; return(
